results.content: Great course. Very detailed yet to the point and not a lot of fluff. Great quick guide to setting up a wordpress site to be seo optimized. I have been building wordpress sites for a long time and this is great information for getting it optimized for seo.

Yet when i chose the course I bought it on his ability to sell himself and felt i would have gotten far more from the course.

response.content: Hi John - thanks for the feedback. Feel free to ask questions in the Q&A if you want clarification on anything. Its a technical subject so can be a bit matter of a fact. But I take your point on board. Kind regards

results.content: Very clear, precise and with detailed easy-to-follow and step-by-step instructions. I must admit that the author is talking from a practical view points and must have done many years of trial and improvements to arrive at the best SEO tactics, Yoast settings and other plugins he recommended.

results.content: Helana here- Am building a WordPress website for my own start-up idea in Sweden and want to get traffic straight away. This course is helping a lot. Long course but learning a lot and easy to follow a long- big recommendation for Simon...thanks for answering my questions.

results.content:
I know a lot about Wordpress but needed to brush up on the seo side of things. Liked the look of this course and must say am impressed! Very concise and to the point. Goes into some advanced stuff which is really well taught for complex theory. Thanks Simon!
Erika
